**BOOK YOUR SHOW APP**
* The project will run with npm install and npm start.
* This app helps the user to book movie tickets online. User will be provided with the QR code after the completion of booking.
* User need not login to view the list of movies and its details.
* The movie details can be viewed by clicking on that particular movie. 
* User can go back to the home page by clicking on "Return to home page" button.
* Login is required to book the tickets.
* To book the tickets/ticket, user has to provide valid "date", "time" and "number of tickets".(error is shown if it is not valid).
* Receipt is displayed after the booking is completed.(payment option is skipped as it was not suggested. But, service call is made after the completion of booking to store the ticket details.)
* User can always view his bookings in "Your bookings". This will help the user to review his bookings and use it when required.
* "Cancel booking" option helps user to cancel the booking. This option can be found in "Your bookings".
* Logout button which is present on each and every page(except login) will help the user to logout when necessary.
